author: DGTraveler00
title: Uncomfortable stay
text:
I stayed last week at the Hotel Banke for a business trip. There are good things about the hotel, but unfortunately the negatives were more, at least for me:
Good:
- Hotel is beautiful
- Location is very convenient
- Staff was very nice and friendly
Bad:
- Room was extremely hot (in March), A/C did not work and window opened just a little bit to an interior space with no air circulation.
- Wifi was not usable: I couldn't do any video calls with my family (dropped after a few seconds) and couldn't login to my company's VPN (this has never happened at any other hotel I've stayed at).
- The room was beautiful, but not functional: clothes armoire was extremely hot, probably because of the small fridge inside it; desk was very small; there was no place to put bag; the toilet seat room (separate from shower/sink) had little ventilation.
Room Tip: Ask for an outside facing room (indoor rooms have poor ventilation). See more room tips
